name: Embracing Hell
description:
hardcore stage diving simulator made for Hard Core Punk Jam

made with Scratch, the most hardcore game engine there is !

the whimsical creatures are from The Drolatic Dreams of Pantagruel (1565) by François Rabelais which I discovered a few days ago and I fell in love with. and it's public domain ! ^^

and I needed some music so the track you hear was an impro of me practicing my drums after three drums lessons and shouting "I'm embracing Hell" that I recorded somewhere around six monts ago with my phone for the punk band we're (still) trying to start with my bras.

photo credits : Unsplash.com

---

cliquez sur l'artiste pour sauter dans la foule
